title: THIS CANT BE REAL! GREAT DOWNTOWN 1 BEDROOM APARMTENT!
app_fee: $48 for everyone over 18 years of age
posting_body: ['Avant Apartments', '1420 Figueroa Street', 'Los Angeles, CA 90015', 'show contact info', 'DONT MISS THIS GORGEOUS DOWNTOWN 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT HOME!', 'Apartment Details:', '• Unit Number: B714', '• 1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom', '• Approximately 691 sq.', 'ft.', '• Rent $2,466* on a 12 month lease', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'for more details !', 'CONTACT US TODAY TO LEARN MORE AND SCHEDULE A TOUR!!', 'Finding your new apartment home has never been easier with our self-guided tours (currently limited to two people per tour), 360-degree virtual tours, personalized mobile tours, and our quick-and-easy online application process.', 'Call us at', 'show contact info', 'OUR COMMUNITY DIFFERENCE:', '- 30 days satisfaction Guarantee', '- Free Virtual Classes', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- An Equal Housing Opportunity', '- Pricing and Availability is Subject To Change', '- We do NOT participate in Airbnb', 'Nearby: Fashion District, Little Tokyo, South Park, Financial District, Bunker Hill, Jewelry District, Arts District, Civic Center, Chinatown, Central Industrial District, Central City East, Historic Core, DTLA, Downtown Los Angeles, Staples Center, Convention Center.', '*Prices and Specials Subject to Change']
